alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 4:22AM CDT until June 19 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lowndes County in south central Alabama... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 422 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Belknap, or 13 miles west of Mosses, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Deposit, Mosses, Hayneville, White Hall, Gordonville, Lowndesboro, Lowndes County Airport, Beechwood, Logan, Calhoun, Letohatchee, Mount Willing, Collirene, Clover Hill, Farmersville and Fostoria. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
